object.name: ChatJoinRequest
object.description: Represents a join request sent to a chat.
object.html_description: Represents a join request sent to a chat.
object.rst_description: Represents a join request sent to a chat.

annotations.description: Chat to which the request was sent
annotations.html_description: Chat to which the request was sent
annotations.rst_description: Chat to which the request was sent
annotations.name: chat

annotations.description: User that sent the join request
annotations.rst_description: User that sent the join request
annotations.name: from

annotations.description: Date the request was sent in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the request was sent in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the request was sent in Unix time
annotations.name: date

annotations.description: Chat invite link that was used by the user to send the join request
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat invite link that was used by the user to send the join request
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat invite link that was used by the user to send the join request
annotations.name: invite_link
